column6: Worldventures Marketing, LLC provides leisure travel services. It offers DreamTrips Membership, which provides a built-in community of fellow vacationers and vacation planning; DreamTrips Life Membership; and Luxury DreamTrips Membership, which provides access to a calendar of destinations worldwide. The company provides a wide range of international destinations. Founded in 2005, the company is based in Plano, Texas, United States.

British American Tobacco PLC engages in the production and sale of tobacco products. It provides cigarettes and cigars; snus, a low-toxicant smokeless tobacco product; and e-cigarettes and other products, such as vapour and tobacco heating products, as well as nicotine inhalers. The company offers its products under the Dunhill, Kent, Lucky Strike, Pall Mall, Rothmans, Vogue, Viceroy, Kool, Peter Stuyvesant, Craven A, Benson & Hedges, John Player Gold Leaf, State Express 555, and Shuang Xi brands. It also operates a retail store under Vype brand name in Milan. The company sells its products in the Americas, eastern and western Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and the Asia-Pacific. British American Tobacco was founded in 1902 and is headquartered in London, UK.
African Medallion Group produces exclusive gold products including gold Krugerrand, medallions and gold bullion coins. The firm was founded in 2017 and is based in Johannesburg, South Africa.

Apelby Communications provides telecommunication services. The company's remit includes international voice traffic services, data and SMS, outsourcing services for retail customers, and fraud and market protection services. Apelby Communications was founded in 2005 and is based in Dusseldorf, Germany.
Zillionaire Mobile TV network is a TV streaming and broadcasting network which serves customers in Africa. The company is headquartered in Johannesburg, South Africa.

Multiconsult provides engineering and consulting services to public and private clients. It offers impact assessments, zoning plans, project development, life cycle planning, design, management, and condition surveys. The company also provides oil and gas sector services, such as marine and offshore structures, as well as onshore processing facilities. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Oslo, Norway.

Botswana-based Choppies, an investment holding company, owns and operates a chain of supermarkets in sub-Saharan Africa. The company operates value stores, superstores, and hyperstores under the Choppies brand name. Its stores offer products, including fruits and vegetables, bakery, butchery, takeaway, kiosk, bulk buys, frozen foods, cold drinks, dairy and general merchandise. In addition, the company distributes meat. Choppies was founded in 1986 and is based in Gaborone, Botswana.

Tsogo Sun Holdings, through its subsidiaries, operates as a gaming, hotel and entertainment company. It operates Southern Sun branded hotels as well as approximately 14 casinos in South Africa. The company also owns, leases and manages approximately 94 hotels in Africa, the Middle East and the Seychelles. Tsogo Sun Holdings is based in Fourways, Johannesburg, South Africa.

Switzerland-based Fracht provides logistics solutions. The company offers air freight and sea freight delivery in addition to rail, barging and trucking services. Founded in 1955, Fracht is headquartered in Basel, Switzerland.

Chenguang Biotech Group Co., Ltd. is a China-based company principally engaged in the manufacture and sales of natural pigment extracts, natural spices extracts, essential oil extracts, natural supplement and medicine extracts, fat and protein and others. The Company's products include pigment, spices, supplement and medicine products, cottonseed products and others. The Company distributes its products in domestic and to overseas markets.

South Africa-based Shoprite operates as a consumer goods retailer. It engages in the retail sale of furniture, appliances, home entertainment products and floor coverings as well as food products. Shoprite was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in the Brackenfell area of Cape Town, South Africa.
Walmart is a multinational retail firm that operates hypermarkets, discount department stores, and grocery stores. Walmart was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bentonville, Arkansas, US.

The Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS) with historical origins in the Academia Sinica during the Republic of China era, is the national academy for the natural sciences of the People's Republic of China (PRC). The organisation was founded in 1949 and is based in Beijing, China.

Elsewedy Electric is an international organisation specialised in the supply, installation and commissioning of overhead transmission lines and substations. These are on a turnkey basis and services for utilities and industries including rural electrification and street lighting projects throughout Africa and the Middle East. It was founded in 1938 and is based in Cairo, Egypt.

Ethiopian Airlines provides passenger and cargo airline services. Its cargo services include handling perishable and valuable goods, horticulture, live animals, human remains, dangerous goods mail. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.
Mera Group Corporation operates as a renewable energy specialist specialising in the manufacture and distribution of solar energy panels. The company is headquartered in Miyazaki, Japan.
column37: Zambia and additional countries in the region.
